name: Air Dash
description: Minimalist style, frantic time management and equipment management game of managing a Budget Airline Tycoon. Air Dash.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or later Processor: 2 GHz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4700 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
